home.title: Data Scientist & AI Specialist
home.description: I'm Omar, a passionate data scientist with over 5 years of experience in AI and machine learning  transforming data into actionable insights through predictive modeling and big data analytics.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm {name}, a passionate {role} with a deep curiosity for turning raw data into meaningful insights. With over five years of experience in {ai} and {ml}, I specialize in building predictive models and scalable analytics solutions that drive data-informed decisions.
about.experience: I've worked on diverse projects across {visualization}, {analytics}, and {modeling}, collaborating closely with engineers and business teams to translate complex data into actionable strategies. My approach blends analytical precision with creative problem-solving — ensuring every model tells a story and every insight drives impact.
about.goal: My goal is to continue advancing in the fields of {research} and {innovation}, contributing to products and systems that help people make smarter, faster, and more ethical decisions through data.
about.name: Omar AlZahdy

tech.title: Tech Stack & Tools
tech.description: A snapshot of the technologies I use to explore data, build models, and deliver insights.

list.title: Improving Recommendation Systems with Hybrid Deep Learning Models
list.abstract: This paper explores a novel hybrid architecture combining collaborative filtering and neural embeddings to enhance personalization accuracy.

list.title: Explainable AI in Predictive Analytics
list.abstract: A study focusing on integrating explainable AI techniques within predictive modeling pipelines for greater transparency and trust.

list.title: Real-Time Data Visualization for Large-Scale Systems
list.abstract: Introduces an optimized framework for rendering large-scale, real-time data visualizations with low latency using D3.js and WebGL.
